name: Moinsrift
description:
Literally made this in 1hr45m just to see if I can create web games for itch.io. WASD to move around, hold in right click and left click once to move your cursor ingame. I actually do not give half a damn about this game and probably won't be making more progress on it.

The game is literally just 100 chunks of blocks, which *could* be manipulated to add/remove blocks to, but I'm too lazy to do that. If you suddenly decide that you want this source code, you can GLADLY take it.
